---
title: "lsmeansVsReleveling"
author: "Chelsea Parlett"
date: "7/2/2019"
output: html_document
---

```{r create}
library(ggplot2)
library(lsmeans)

#--create data--------------------------------
set.seed(123)
A <- rnorm(300, 10, 20)
B <- rnorm(300, 12, 20)
C <- rnorm(300, 14, 20)

dat <- data.frame(Score = c(A,B,C),
                  label = sort(rep(c("A","B","C"), 300)))

ggplot(dat, aes(x = label, y = Score)) + geom_boxplot()
```

## A as reference
```{r A}
m <- lm(Score~label, data = dat)
summary(m)

ls <- lsmeans(m, pairwise ~ label)
ls
```

## B as reference
```{r B}
dat$label <- relevel(dat$label, "B")
m2 <- lm(Score~label, data = dat)
summary(m2)

ls2 <- lsmeans(m2, pairwise ~ label)
ls2
```


## C as reference
```{r C}
dat$label <- relevel(dat$label, "C")
m3 <- lm(Score~label, data = dat)
summary(m3)

ls3 <- lsmeans(m3, pairwise ~ label)
ls3
```
